did.unittitle: Reprint of Personal Recollections and Literary History, p. 143-146, and original print of Our World is a Book, p. 180-186, and as published in I Have A Place

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes a transcript published by Alice Lloyd College of a speech given by Arnow before an Appalshop Writer's Workshop.
